divs: Sighting DetailsOn June 5th I did a worldwide internet meditation lead by Lyssa Royal Holt held by Paranormal Matrix for "First Contact". Many things have happened since then but I was never afraid until lately. A week following the meditation I woke and while taking a shower my stomach was burning. Looking down I had (5) 1 inch cuts leading out of my navel and (1) 2 inch cut to the left of my navel. I wasn't alarmed, in fact, felt very calm. I showed the cuts to my husband. I have a scar from the cut next to my navel. Many strange things have happened since. I am irritated with myself for doing the meditation but I felt very compelled to do it at the time. I opened the door to communication and now I want it to stop. I contacted Paranormal Matrix for help regarding this situation but they have never responded. I emailed Mufon Abductions last week and I have had no response from them either. I did have a close UFO sighting in 2008. I reported it in 2009 after someone else saw the same thing a yr after I saw it. They had photographed it and my photos did not come out with anything. I am willing to be hypnotized.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Pueblo
There were no other sightings in Pueblo on or around June 5th 2010
